    • isRootViewAdded

      public static boolean isRootViewAdded()
      Gets the boolean value if rootview is added to fxml or not
      Returns:
      returs the boolean value if rootview is added or not

    • setRootViewAdded

      public static void setRootViewAdded(boolean rootViewAdded)
      Sets the boolean value if rootview is added or not
      Parameters:
      rootViewAdded - gives the value if rootview is added to fxml or not

    • setRoot

      public void setRoot()
      Creates the initial window when logging in.

    • setRoot

      public void setRoot(ModuleEntry m)
      Initially sets up the study structure field with the users selected degree. Creates the modules at the top of the hierarchy.
      Parameters:
      m - - The root module of a study structure.

    • addChildrenTreeView

      public static void addChildrenTreeView(ModuleEntry parent, javafx.scene.control.TreeItem visualItem)
      Adds the children of a module to the TreeView, creating a new dropdown with all the content under the parent.
      Parameters:
      parent - - Parent study module
      visualItem - - TreeItem which is set to have new child items

    • treeViewMouseEvent

      public void treeViewMouseEvent(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Handles clicks in the treeView UI.
      Parameters:
      e - - MouseEvent pointing to the clicked element.

    • handleCheckBox

      public void handleCheckBox(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Updates information in the student JSON file when a new course is set to "Completed" status, adds the earned credits to the students data. If the "Completed" status is removed, removes credits and completion for the course from the data.
      Parameters:
      e - - MouseEvent pointing to the used checkbox.

    • addStudentInfo

      public void addStudentInfo()
      When logging into the application, sets the account credentials to the UI fields to show the account currently logged in. Adds all of the possible degrees to the dropdown menu.

    • saveStudentData

      public void saveStudentData()
      Saves the additional student data to the JSON file which contains student information.

    • closeButtonHandler

      public void closeButtonHandler() throws IOException
      Handles closing of the application, when closing saves the student JSON file to save any changes made to student information I.E; new completed courses or other student information
      Throws:
      IOException - - If file is not found, throws exception.

    • addDegree

      public void addDegree()
      Adds a chosen degree to the student information JSON file. The degree added is chosen from the dropdown menu.

    • addItemsToStudentData

      public void addItemsToStudentData(String item, javafx.scene.control.TextField textField)
      Adds a single information field to the student data JSON file by getting the value of the text entry field
      Parameters:
      item - - Name of the data to be added
      textField - - The object of the entry field

    • hasModule

      public static boolean hasModule(String id)
      Checks if a Student has a certain module in their "Completed Courses"
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the module
      Returns:
      Boolean, true if found, false if not

    • getCurrentIDObject

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject getCurrentIDObject()
      Returns the value of current student's study information

      the value of current student's study information
